titleStmt.title: The west-country lawyer or, The witty maid's good fortune; who wisely maintain'd her virginity against the golden assaults of the lawyer, who at length married her to her hearts content. To the tune of The baffled knight,.

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing W1404.
Verse: "A youthful lawyer fine and gay ..."
Cf. Wing W1404 which has "Licensed according to order" in title.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
